answers.answer: Do you have diabetes?  Pretty common for these floaters to be seen by diabetics from what my mom's doctor told her, though it's not impossible for someone without diabetes to see them.  Usually I only get them if I look at/toward a bright light source or have a camera flash me as I think is the case with most people.  If they're staying longer than a few minutes after such an incident or are there all the time, I'd look for an underlying condition since your doctor said your eyes were healthy (though some can be revealed through eye exams).  How has your health been otherwise?

question: I went to the eye doctor today because I've been seeing flashing lights in my eyes.  My eye doctor said after my eye exam that my eyes were healthy, but im still seeing flashers.  What could this be?
title: Eye Health
